docs.lead_paragraph: Andy Murray captured his first title of the year and became the first British man to win the Dubai Tennis Championships in its 25-year history when he defeated Fernando Verdasco 6-3, 6-2 on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Andy Murray Wins His First Title of the Year in Dubai
headline.main: Andy Murray Wins His First Title of the Year in Dubai

docs.snippet: Andy Murray captured his first title of the year and became the first British man to win the Dubai Tennis Championships in its 25-year history when he defeated Fernando Verdasco 6-3, 6-2 on Saturday....

docs.lead_paragraph: Louis Tomlinson, a singer with the "boy band" One Direction, was arrested after getting into a "physical altercation" with a photographer at Los Angeles International Airport, according to police records and media reports on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: One Direction Singer Arrested at LAX After Altercation With Paparazzi

docs.lead_paragraph: Three people were killed on Saturday when a house where fireworks were being made blew up in the same town recently hit by a devastating explosion of a fireworks market, local authorities said.

headline.print_headline: Blast Kills at Least 3 in Mexico Town Hit by December Fireworks Explosion

docs.lead_paragraph: Spaniards Javi Martinez and Juan Bernat scored their first league goals of the season to give Bayern Munich a comfortable 3-0 victory at Cologne on Saturday and move seven points clear at the top of the Bundesliga.

headline.print_headline: A Taste of Spain as Bayern Ease Past Cologne

docs.lead_paragraph: A 7.9 billion euro plan to turn a derelict former Athens airport into one of Europe's biggest coastal resorts, included in Greece's latest international bailout, will go ahead despite recent delays, a senior privatization agency official said on Saturday.

docs.lead_paragraph: The tribe, exerting its sovereignty, brought the case over property damage caused by a 5.8-magnitude quake in September likely caused by fracking.
